name: Deadlift
how_to: Stand with feet hip-width apart, grip the barbell just outside your legs, lift the bar by extending your hips and knees, keeping your back straight.

name: Pull-Up
how_to: Hang from a bar with a shoulder-width grip, pull your body up until your chin is above the bar, then lower back down.

name: Bent-Over Barbell Row
how_to: Bend at the hips and knees, keep your back straight, pull the barbell to your waist, and lower it back down.

name: T-Bar Row
how_to: Use a T-bar row machine or barbell, bend at the hips and knees, pull the handle or bar towards your chest, and lower it back down.

name: Seated Cable Row
how_to: Sit on a rowing machine, grab the handles, pull them towards your torso, and extend your arms back out.

name: Lat Pulldown
how_to: Sit at a lat pulldown machine, grip the bar wider than shoulder-width, pull it down to your chest, and slowly let it rise back up.

name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Row
how_to: Place one knee and hand on a bench, with the other foot on the floor, pull a dumbbell towards your hip, and lower it back down.

name: Face Pull
how_to: Attach a rope to a cable machine at upper chest height, pull the rope towards your face with your elbows flared out, and return to the starting position.

name: Straight-Arm Pulldown
how_to: Stand at a cable machine with a straight bar, keep your arms straight, pull the bar down to your thighs, and slowly let it rise back up.

name: Chest-Supported Row
how_to: Lie face down on an incline bench, row dumbbells or a barbell towards your chest, and lower them back down.

name: Good Morning
how_to: Place a barbell on your shoulders, bend at the hips with a slight knee bend, keep your back straight, and return to the starting position.

name: Rack Pull
how_to: Perform a deadlift with the barbell starting on safety pins in a power rack, just below knee height, and lift it as you would a deadlift.

name: Inverted Row
how_to: Lie under a bar set at waist height, grip the bar, pull your chest to the bar, and lower yourself back down.
